verses.text: A Psalm of Asaph. God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
Deliver the poor and needy: deliver themfrom the hand of the wicked.
They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
I have said, Ye aregods; and all of you arechildren of the Most High.
But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou wilt inherit all nations.
